fields.fieldTitle: What is your Main keyword phrase / topic of the ad?

fieldHint.hint2: Ex: for sale by owner, Nerve Pain, Photography, Video Marketing, Facebook Marketing, Public Speaking

fields.fieldTitle: Who is your target / Niche audience member? (SINGULAR)

fieldHint.hint2: (Ex: home seller, Diabetic, Video Marketer, Small Business Owner, Public Speaker, Author, Coach, Consultant, Marketer, Entrepreneur, Part-time Photographer)

fields.fieldTitle: NAME or TITLE of the what you want them to buy, try, download?

fieldHint.hint1: Ex: "Selling Your Home Alone", Neuracel, 5 Secrets To Deleting Nerve Pain, The Biohacker's Guide, Neuropathy Supplements, Funnel Scripts, Webinar Secrets, Big Jim's Running Shoes, Kodak XLR 75, The Speaker's Edge Coaching

fields.fieldTitle: What is this "thing" that holds the solution they want?

fieldHint.hint2: This _____ holds the solution you're looking for!

fieldHint.hint3: Ex: pain reliever, supplement, service, coaching, website, template, blueprint, checklist, software, home study course, ebook, place, FB Post, info-graphic, list, guide, digital camera, etc

fields.fieldTitle: Describe the "thing" from above in a way that arouses curiosity

fieldHint.hint2: Ex: under-the-radar, free, little-known, proven, "black hole", off-the-record, breakthrough, revolutionary, new

fields.fieldTitle: #1 Big payoff/gain your audience wants from what you offer?

fieldHint.hint2: This product / service will help you quickly ______!

fieldHint.hint3: Ex: get your home sold, get pain relief; get video scripts that sell; get more customers; get booked to speak more; get more paid speaking gigs, make more money, and grow my speaking business; make people pull out their wallets and literally beg to buy your products, take amazing pictures

fields.fieldTitle: When you wave your magic wand, when do they get the big payoff?

fieldHint.hint2: Ex: automatically, quickly, instantly, immediately, fast, in a flash

fields.fieldTitle: In what timeframe do they get that big payoff? (TIME)

fieldHint.hint1: Ex: instantly, 15 minutes, less than 30 minutes, about an hour, an afternoon, a single weekend, 20XX

fields.fieldTitle: #1 BIG obstacle/negative circumstance/pain they want to avoid?

fieldHint.hint1: Starts with a VERB ending in "ING"

fieldHint.hint3: Ex: paying a real estate broker's crazy commissions, using dangerous drugs, feeling like you have to be a professional photographer to take great pictures, figuring it all out yourself, knowing what to say in marketing videos, being a professional copywriter, losing money on ad campaigns, begging for speaking gigs
